    • uncc.objects.HSQLDatabaseObject
      • uncc.objects.Rental
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Rental
extends HSQLDatabaseObject
    Object that holds information about a book Rental.

    0.1

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rental

        public Rental(Student student,
              Book book)
        Constructor for the Rental object. It is assumed that this book has no concrete due date, and that no tutor is in charge of monitoring this rental.
        Parameters:
        student - The student the book is rented to.
        book - The book the student rented.

      • Rental

        public Rental(Student student,
              Book book,
              Tutor tutor)
        Constructor for the Rental object. It is assumed that this book has no concrete due date.
        Parameters:
        student - The student the book is rented to.
        book - The book the student rented.
        tutor - The tutor who oversees this rental.

      • Rental

        public Rental(Student student,
              Book book,
              java.util.Date dueDate)
        Constructor for the Rental object. It is assumed that no tutor is in charge of monitoring this rental.
        Parameters:
        student - The student the book is rented to.
        book - The book the student rented.
        dueDate - The date the book is due back to the tutoring center.

      • Rental

        public Rental(Student student,
              Book book,
              java.util.Date dueDate,
              Tutor tutor)
        Constructor for the Rental object.
        Parameters:
        student - The student the book is rented to.
        book - The book the student rented.
        dueDate - The date the book is due back to the tutoring center.
        tutor - The tutor who oversees this rental.

        public Student getStudent()
        Returns:
